mapper.select: select u1.username as initiator,u2.username as acceptor ,c.run_datetime,c.run_location from nearby_running c join user u1 on u1.user_id = c.initiator_id join user u2 on u2.user_id = c.acceptor_id

select u1.username as initiator, IF(c.acceptor_id IS NOT NULL, u2.username, null) AS acceptor, c.run_datetime,c.run_location from nearby_running c join user u1 on c.initiator_id = u1.user_id left join user u2 on c.acceptor_id = u2.user_id
c.run_id = #{id}
